featured.text: Which of the following is closest in meaning to “arid” in the first paragraph? (A) Occupied.
But fresh water can be in short supply in many arid regions of the world such as Saudi Arabia, where there are limited water resources.

definition.zh_def: 乾燥的，缺乏水分的，通常指氣候或土壤。
definition.en_def: Having little or no rain; too dry or barren to support vegetation.
definition.example: The arid desert landscape stretched for miles without any signs of life.
